title: Agent System Enhancement - Goals, Instructions, and Plan Flexibility
description: Enhance the agent system with: 1) MCP tools for reading/writing goals and success criteria, 2) Coordinator ability to generate workspace instruction files before handoff, 3) Plan step reordering capabilities, 4) Update all agent files with Builder awareness and new tool documentation, 5) Create comprehensive instruction file for agents

context.reason: Implementing Phase 1 - MCP Tool Extensions for goals/success_criteria and step reordering
steps_to_complete: Add goals and success_criteria parameters to memory_plan 'create' action
Add new 'set_goals' action to memory_plan tool
Add 'reorder_steps' action to memory_steps tool
Add 'move_step' action to memory_steps tool

agent_sessions.summary: Completed Phase 1 MCP Tool Extensions: (1) Added goals/success_criteria params to memory_plan create action, (2) Added set_goals action to memory_plan for updating goals on existing plans, (3) Added reorder action to memory_steps for swapping step with adjacent step, (4) Added move action to memory_steps for moving step to specific index. All changes compiled successfully.

context.implementation_summary: New MCP tool actions: set_goals for plans, reorder/move for steps

agent_sessions.summary: Wrote 30 unit tests for Phase 1 MCP Tool Extensions: (1) goals-success-criteria.test.ts - 12 tests covering memory_plan 'create' with goals/success_criteria params and 'set_goals' action with various param combinations, error handling, and edge cases; (2) step-reordering.test.ts - 18 tests covering memory_steps 'reorder' action (up/down directions, boundary cases) and 'move' action (index swapping, re-indexing, validation, data preservation). Tests follow existing patterns using vitest with file-store mocking.

steps_to_complete: Step 6: Add 'generate_instructions' action to memory_context tool
Step 7: Create instruction file template structure
Step 8: Implement workspace-local instruction file writing
Step 9: Add instruction file discovery for subagents on init

agent_sessions.summary: Completed Phase 2 - Instruction File Generation (steps 6-9): (1) Added generate_instructions action to memory_context with target_agent, mission, context, constraints, deliverables, files_to_read, output_path parameters; (2) Created markdown template with Mission/Context/Constraints/Deliverables/Files sections; (3) Implemented workspace-local file writing to .memory/instructions/{agent}-{timestamp}.md; (4) Added discoverInstructionFiles function to find and parse instruction files; (5) Integrated instruction file discovery into initialiseAgent - agents now receive instruction_files array on init. Build verified successfully.

steps_to_complete: Update coordinator.agent.md with Builder agent awareness
Update coordinator.agent.md to read goals/success_criteria after each phase
Update coordinator.agent.md with instruction file generation before handoff
Update architect.agent.md with set_goals action documentation
Update builder.agent.md with full tool documentation
Update all other agent files with reordering and new tool awareness

agent_sessions.summary: Completed Phase 3 - Agent File Updates (steps 11-16): (1) Updated coordinator.agent.md with Builder agent in workflow sequence, sub-agent prompts, and diagrams; (2) Added goals/success_criteria tracking section with example code; (3) Added instruction file generation documentation for subagent spawning; (4) Updated architect.agent.md with set_goals action and workflow; (5) Updated builder.agent.md with full build script action reference; (6) Updated all other agents (executor, reviewer, tester, revisionist, researcher, archivist, analyst, brainstorm) with reorder/move step actions and instruction file awareness.

steps_to_complete: Step 17: Create instructions/project-memory-system.instructions.md with full MCP tool reference
Step 18: Document all memory_workspace actions and parameters
Step 19: Document all memory_plan actions and parameters
Step 20: Document all memory_steps actions and parameters
Step 21: Document all memory_agent actions and parameters
Step 22: Document all memory_context actions and parameters
Step 23: Add agent workflow examples and best practices section

agent_sessions.summary: Completed Phase 4 - Comprehensive Documentation (Steps 17-23). Created instructions/project-memory-system.instructions.md - a complete 1000+ line reference document covering: (1) Overview with core concepts and agent types, (2) Quick Start guide, (3) Tool Summary table, (4) All memory_workspace actions (register, list, info, reindex), (5) All memory_plan actions (15 actions including set_goals, build scripts), (6) All memory_steps actions (7 actions including reorder, move), (7) All memory_agent actions (9 actions), (8) All memory_context actions (7 actions including generate_instructions), (9) Full agent workflow examples with diagrams, (10) 6 best practices with examples, (11) 5 anti-patterns to avoid, (12) Tips for all 11 agent roles, (13) Type reference appendix. This is now the definitive reference for agents using the Project Memory MCP system.

Phase 5 Integration Testing COMPLETE. Results: 177 tests, ALL PASS, 0 failures (1.28s). Verified: (1) goals/success_criteria - 13 tests for create/set_goals/get operations; (2) step reordering - 23 tests for reorder up/down, move to index, re-indexing, data preservation; (3) generate_instructions - action implemented, compiles, integrated with contextTools. Steps 24-27 done. Remaining: Steps 28-29 (Builder: rebuild extension, install and verify).

lineage.reason: Phase 1 MCP Tool Extensions complete. 4 steps implemented (0-3). Build verified. Ready for code review. Steps 4-5 (tests) assigned to Tester agent.
Phase 1 tests complete. Created 30 unit tests in 2 test files covering goals/success_criteria and step reordering actions. Ready for Executor to implement Phase 2 (Instruction File Generation).
Phase 2 complete. Implemented instruction file generation (steps 6-9). Build verified. Ready for Tester to write tests for step 10.

Phase 3 complete. Updated all 11 agent markdown files with: Builder workflow awareness, goals/success_criteria tracking, instruction file generation, step reordering (reorder/move actions). Ready for Executor to continue with Phase 4 (Comprehensive Documentation).

Phase 4 (Comprehensive Documentation) complete. Created definitive MCP tool reference at instructions/project-memory-system.instructions.md with all 5 tools, 42 total actions, workflow examples, best practices, and anti-patterns. Ready for Tester to begin Phase 5.

Phase 5 Integration Testing complete. All 177 tests PASS (0 failures). Verified: (1) goals/success_criteria round-trip - 13 tests, (2) step reordering - 23 tests, (3) generate_instructions compiles and integrates. Steps 28-29 (Builder tasks: rebuild VS Code extension, install and verify) are ready. Recommend deploying Builder agent.

Phase 5 Build & Deploy complete. VS Code extension packaged (project-memory-dashboard-0.2.0.vsix, 116.19 KB) and installed successfully. All 30 steps complete (29 done, 1 skipped at step 10). Plan ready for archival. Recommend Archivist for final documentation.

steps.notes: Added 'set_goals' to PlanAction type, added case handler in memory_plan.ts, created setGoals function in plan.tools.ts. Build verified.

steps.task: Add 'reorder_steps' action to memory_steps tool for moving steps up/down
steps.notes: Added 'reorder' action to memory_steps with reorderStep function in plan.tools.ts. Swaps step with adjacent step based on direction (up/down).

steps.task: Add 'move_step' action to memory_steps tool for moving a step to specific index
steps.notes: Added 'move' action to memory_steps with moveStep function in plan.tools.ts. Moves step from one index to another with proper re-indexing.
